title: Crushed
description: “Jackson Quinn.Lover…Hater…Fighter……undeniably, the greatest love of my life.”It all sounds so simple in Selena Graham’s head.Support and love Jackson Quinn, no matter what. But despite how hard she tries to escape with her dignity still intact, she finds herself caught between the rifts of an old and complicated love she can’t compete with. Left with no other choice than to play dirty, Selena has to fight for their love with everything she’s got…or risk being crushed under the weight of her new reality.
author: Skyla Madi
